name: Invaders (itch) (Virtual-Visionary)
description:
A laserdisc style game made for Lost Cartridge Jam 4

Earth 2030: News stories about UFOs now make sense. Aliens have been planning an invasion of earth. In secret, governments around the world collaborated to create a secret weapon, the laserton. Now, it’s up to you to stop the invaders and save the earth!

1985: The Halcyon would have been the first home laserdisc video game console: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halcyon_(console)

2022: Lost Cartridge Creations creates “Invaders”, a laserdisc style arcade game and what Halcyon games would have looked like had the console been released

Controls: LMB to fire

Halcyon startup video: youtube.com/watch?v=D2CUaeqhhbY

Background videos: youtube.com/watch?v=DslTxXsDLsw

Music: youtube.com/watch?v=wbqVXwi3fMQ
